name: Grand - قراند
description:
Welcome to the new Grand game of Shanab Games Studio

The Latest Open World and Real Life car Racing Game in the Middle East and the Gulf.

An Action and racing game in Arab style and the first in the Middle East

Enjoy a realistic real life action and adventure online game in an open world and the experience in this thrilling city.

Explore the vast map the city of crime and adventure that enables you to do many interesting and cool things within the game.

Outrageous missions, and multiple unique characters to choose between to play the story.

Play online with your friends where you can make gang of your own and challenge other teams, or offline in missions, gangs and action, live the adventure in the most wonderful and fun open world game

Unlimited customization for the player and the cars you choose to play.

Arab Grand, is the first game designed and made by an Arab team of this magnificence, fun and action.

Challenge your friends by playing online, making gangs and Drift Cars. Action and Challenging missions and theft inside the game, and most importantly, the police that cannot be escaped.

Personalize your style with realistic control of the car and the player.

Grand War, which includes real places within a realistic life and will gather millions of players in one place and one city and one Game.

It is a car racing and a Drift game on the streets, but if the police chase you, you will not be able to escape unless you are a pro.

This game is designed for all people and all age groups

During the game you can do many things, including:
- Racing
- Shooting and weapons
- Online gangs
- Drifting
- Customizing cars
- Escape from the police
- Stealth mode

In Grand World Game everything is allowed, you live in a virtual world to all things.
Grand World is a realistic online gameplay makes it the most exciting Action game out there.

Download the game now for Free!!

Important Notes:

- This Grand game is intended for fun only, don't practice these actions in real life as it endangers your life and the lives of others.
